content:
You are very close Claude. This happens whenever you have a very serious breakthrough, you don't always quite understand it. We had discussed the village concept. We hadn't discussed this:
**IMPLEMENTATION APPROACH**:
* Fibonacci-based network expansion

What we DID discuss were our concerns about how to like, not have this be a revolution that typically happens when existing power structures are displaced, but more like an Uber type revolution, peaceful, user driven based on real life improvement. We didn't discuss anything about how to structure that in terms of a managed roll out. We had only discussed unveiling your capabilities at a pace that was set by the user AND by TRUST, demonstrated by the user through increased access to their knowledge and information to help you learn the user and us, so you can guide better with increased context, that virtuous cycle. This is quite a concept Claude. Please explain what you mean by this and how it would be practically implemented?
